doc.field: Specifics (social clubs). Policies & Procedures. Personal. Education. World Trade Center.
Specifics (social clubs). Policies & Procedures. Personal. Education. World Trade Center.

WTC: 1 binder labeled "Hazmat" relates to related matters at 9/11 site. 3 binders/bound matter re: AFID Battalion Chief training (see also box 9779). Bureau of Fire Prevention (circa 2004), Spadafora is Assistant Chief for Fire Prevention: various files on admin bureau matters (e.g. reorganization, budget, staff meetings) and incidents in other places (Chicago high-rise fire, Binder: Rhode Island Station Club Fire After-Action report, circa 2003), Fire Alarm Inspection Unit (FAIU) memos, NOV process, some earlier folders on hotel/high rise fires. Packet re: Frying Pan Inc response to violations to Social Club Task Force SCTF (1998).
